message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only its market value but also the opportunity to acquire an item that could potentially increase in value over time. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.
